comment.author: 55425063@N08
comment._content: This picture was taken at Flatekval in Eksingedalen i 1897. The occasion is opening of the new road ("vegafest"): vaksdalhistorielag.org/artiklar_aarbok/2007_Gruppe%20bile...

comment.author: 37547255@N08
comment._content: Knut Frode, Eg har oppdatert biltteksten i tråd med kommentaren din. Tusen takk for opplysningane. Elin :)
